old:
覚者さま、もしかして
ぼくのこと、助けに――？
column2: Dear Arisen, could it be that you will help me?
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
覚者さま！
ぼくにもお供させてください！
column2:
Lord Arisen!
Please allow me to accompany you as well!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
ぼくはこう見えて強いんです！
いつかはお声を掛けてくださいね！
column2: I may not look like it, but I am strong! Please feel free to reach out to me someday.
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
従者が必要？
だったらぼくとかどうですか！？
column2:
Need a follower?
How about me?
speaker: Pure Pawn

old: 暇だなあ――ぼくもお仕事したい！
column2: I'm bored - I want to work too!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
クラフトかあ――いろいろ試してみたいな
試したい戦技もあるんです！
column2: I want to try various crafts. There are also techniques I want to try!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
ねぇねぇ覚者さま！
ぼくにも何かさせてください！
column2:
Hey, hey, Lord Arisen!
Please let me accompany you as well!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old: クラフトって、面白いですね！
speaker: Pure Pawn

old: いますごく調子が良くて、いいのができそう！
column2: I'm in really good shape and it seems like I can do something great!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
えーっと、ごめんなさい
まだもうちょっと！
column2: Um, sorry, still a little more!
speaker: Pure Pawn

column2: Ah... I was feeling so helpless...
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
ごめんなさい！
ぼく、失敗しちゃって――、今度こそ！
column2:
I'm sorry!
I messed up—this time, I'll get it right!
speaker: Pure Pawn

old:
覚者さまと一緒に、また戦えるんですね！
次はもっとがんばらないと――！
column2:
With the Arisen by my side, I can fight again, can't I? 
I'll have to work even harder next time!
speaker: Pure Pawn
